nodes.text: The Olendahu was a YT-1300 light freighter that was used by the Cularin-based company Renna's Transport Service during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

In c. 31 BBY, Renna, the owner of Renna's Transport Service, loaned the Olendahu to the Heroes of Cularin, a group of freelance agents who were on a delivery mission for her. However, while the agents were returning from the assignment, the ship became caught in the Cularin system asteroid belt due to the actions of a shadow creature, which was draining passing starships of power.

The Olendahu appears in the Living Force adventure Philosophy, and is loaned to the players—who role-play as the Heroes of Cularin—if the player characters do not own a starship of their own, but have the skills to use one.
